title: Update Failed. Patch 7.6
body: I cant update . It gives me Update failed while calculating files. i press retry same think happens and happens . tried it on old and new client . restarted my computer . i did everything . Please give me a solution. Thanks

replies.body:
download and use the hextech repair tool, and force repatch.
after that open you lol normally
that worked with me
Worked for me...I started repair while patching..till than no probs at all

C'mon, there's gotta be a resolution to this. I've tried everything. Same results. I want to play this game. Ugh, so annoying "error code 004" is what I'm referring to btw. All this for Galio though?? lol okay. Smh.

It sounds like you could be having a security setting blocking your game files from getting ready and prepared.  As a first step, go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that League is being added as an exception.  Let me know if that helps.
Can u tell me step by step? Ease i appreciate it

Well, there's quite a few different steps and not a single one.  This helps rule out possibilities.  An easy step to start out with would be to try running the patcher As Administrator.  If that doesn't work, the following article can guide you:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions
